projects.name: ECOMZY
projects.description: Utilizing ReactJS for dynamic and responsive user interface development. Upon tapping add to cart, a pop-up screen confirms successful addition and remove to cart as well.

projects.name: MOVIX
projects.description: MOVIX offers users an extensive platform to explore movies and TV shows seamlessly. Utilizing React and Redux, the application provides a dynamic user interface. Delve into the intricate details of each movie or TV show with MOVIX. Leveraging the TMDB API, users can access comprehensive information such as directors, writers, release dates, and runtimes, enriching their viewing experience.

experiences.description: Assisted in the implementation of responsive and visually appealing user interfaces. Contributed to the frontend logic by writing JavaScript code to enhance user interactivity. Ensured the websites responsiveness across various devices and screen sizes, making it user-friendly.

Identified and resolved bugs within the codebase, ensuring smoother operation and enhanced user experience. Proficient in creating, managing, and merging pull requests, facilitating seamless collaboration within the open-source community.
